text: Kit Carson Mesa is the name of a mesa near Rayado in Colfax County, New Mexico. New Mexico State Road 21 runs adjacent to the mesa. It is named after Kit Carson, who is said to have been the first English speaking traveler to visit the town of Rayado. == Further reading == * ==See also== *Philmont Scout Ranch *Miami, New Mexico == References == ==External links== * Category:Mesas of New Mexico Category:Landforms of Colfax County, New Mexico
title: Kit Carson Mesa
